missionVisionPhilosophy.title: Our Mission, Vision, and Philosophy
missionVisionPhilosophy.missionDesc: The fundamental and unchanging purpose of founding Fenix School is to educate Albanian children by creating a small yet high-quality and distinctive educational center.
missionVisionPhilosophy.visionDesc: Fenix School's vision is to be a distinguished educational institution that serves as a benchmark of excellence in educating Albanian children.
missionVisionPhilosophy.philosophyDesc: Focus on students' academic, ethical, and social development by combining tradition with contemporary teaching methods.

features.title: What Makes Us Special?
features.integratedProgramDesc: Harmonizing the Albanian and English curricula enables students to successfully attend both national and international schools.
features.qualityTeachingDesc: Our teachers are dedicated professionals who provide academic support and personal development for every student.
features.supportCareDesc: Every student is unique, and we ensure we support their academic and emotional needs.
features.disciplineDesc: A structured and well-organized environment that fosters student commitment and skill development.
features.highResultsDesc: Fenix School is renowned for the quality and outstanding academic achievements of its students.

welcome.welcomeSubtitle: It's our pleasure to welcome you to our official website!
welcome.introParagraph1: Since our founding in 1996, we have been committed to providing quality education, preparing students for the opportunities and challenges of the future.
welcome.introParagraph2: We believe education is more than a learning process – it's a journey that develops the knowledge, values, and skills students need to become thoughtful, creative, and responsible citizens.
welcome.introParagraph3: We offer a safe and supportive environment where every student feels encouraged to reach their fullest potential.

teachers.title: Academic Staff
teachers.intro: Our teachers are truly the golden hands of Fenix School.
teachers.experience: They all have extensive and valuable experience, not only in teaching but also in the unique approach to working with the Anglo-Albanian integrated curriculum.
teachers.approach: They are outstanding experts and practitioners of this unique approach, reflecting every day our school's philosophy in the classroom.
teachers.values: Our staff cultivate strong organizational values, develop a high level of professional responsibility, and convey genuine quality in every aspect of teaching.
teachers.teamwork: Our teachers work in a coordinated way as a united team, sharing experiences, ideas, and successful practices to continuously improve the learning process.
teachers.training: Internal training is a strong pillar of professional development, supported by the administration, coordinators, and department heads. At the same time, they also attend national and international external trainings, always keeping themselves updated with the latest developments in education.
teachers.student_focus: They diligently attend to each student's needs in every subject, working closely with level coordinators and leaders to analyze data and turn it into concrete improvement and achievement plans.
teachers.appreciation: Our school values teachers as its most precious asset—both professionally and personally—creating a safe, respected, and motivating work environment.
teachers.stability: The school follows a strong stability policy, preserving and further developing our extraordinary team.

team.title: Leadership Team
team.beliefParagraph: At "FENIX" School, we believe that a visionary and dedicated leadership team is essential to building an environment where every child feels safe, valued, and inspired to achieve their best.
team.teamEmbodiesParagraph: Our team embodies experience, professionalism, and a daily commitment to the quality, development, and well-being of every student.
team.executiveDirectorDescription: Responsible for the overall management of the school, long-term strategy, and administration. Ensures smooth operation, represents the school in relations with institutions, and leads its continuous development.
team.programDirectorDescription: Oversees the teaching process and curriculum implementation. Works with teachers to ensure high teaching standards and provide students with a rich educational experience.
team.servicesDirectorDescription: Manages all school support services: security, catering, healthcare, and the daily well-being of students. Ensures a safe, healthy, and supportive environment for all.
team.primaryCoordinatorDescription: Oversees the teaching process, discipline, and daily organization for primary cycle students. Ensures a strong academic and emotional foundation for young children.
team.lowerSecondaryCoordinatorDescription: Responsible for the academic progress and development of students in this preparatory stage. Promotes discipline and motivation as they transition to secondary education.
team.administrativeCoordinatorDescription: Manages the secretariat and administrative processes, including enrollments, documentation, and communication with parents. Ensures all procedures are organized and comply with legal and internal standards.

why.title: Why FENIX?
why.intro: At a time when education is a challenge and choosing the right school is decisive for children's futures, FENIX is more than an educational institution – it is a center of quality, values, and security.
why.resultsDesc: For us, quality is not just a goal – it is our daily standard. The highest scores on the National Basic Education Exams and our students' success in Secondary Education reflect our tireless work and dedication.
why.disciplineDesc: We believe education begins with order, commitment, and respect. At FENIX, every student feels valued, equal, and part of a community that fosters growth and character.
why.safetyTitle: Safety at the Heart of Every Action:
why.safetyDesc: The emotional, physical, and social safety of our students is an absolute priority. They are under constant care in a protected, warm, and well-organized environment.
why.teamDesc: Dedicated teachers, capable staff, and visionary leadership – this is the force that keeps FENIX steadfast in its mission: to educate with excellence and inspire the next generation.
why.closing: At FENIX, success is no coincidence – it is our mission and tradition.

duties: Protects the mission, tradition, and philosophy of the school
Ensures the continuity and integrity of the school

directorsBoard.title: Board of Directors
directorsBoard.description: This board handles the daily management of the school and the implementation of its policies.
directorsBoard.mission: Responsible for: academic quality, services, daily management, and the practical operation of the school.

programmes.integratedProgramIntro: Fenix School offers an integrated curriculum that combines two distinct educational systems – the Albanian and the English.
integratedProgramDetails: This harmonization is a unique process that has evolved and improved over the years, enabling our students to meet the standards of both curricula.

Through this integration, our students receive a comprehensive and balanced education that prepares them to succeed in both national and international schools, and to develop skills demanded in a global environment.
Our curriculum is a testament to the quality of education our students receive, preparing them for success in any educational or professional setting.
Our way of working is an exclusive feature of Fenix School—an approach built on long and successful experience, continuously supported by ongoing training for our teachers.

assessmentPage.intro: Assessment is a key part of every student's academic development. We believe that ongoing, objective evaluation helps identify strengths and areas for improvement, ensuring students have the opportunity to grow and reach their fullest potential.
objectives: Monitor academic progress and provide continuous feedback.
Offer opportunities for students to improve their skills and develop deep understanding in studied subjects.
Engage students and parents in the learning process, ensuring transparency and open communication.
Create an environment that fosters motivation and efforts toward high achievement.
assessmentPage.formativeDesc: This type of assessment is used throughout the learning process to monitor student progress and offer chances for ongoing improvement. It includes regular assignments, class discussions, and varied activities that help students grasp concepts and build skills.
assessmentPage.summativeDesc: This type of assessment measures students' knowledge and skills at the end of a set period. It includes exams and tests that help evaluate readiness for the next level of education.
assessmentPage.performanceDesc: Beyond tests and exams, we use projects, practical work, and presentations that help students develop applicable skills and measure their progress across different areas.
assessmentPage.progressDesc: We regularly monitor student progress through ongoing reports and open communication with parents. This allows us to intervene in time and provide necessary support to those who may face challenges, helping them reach the required level of success.
assessmentPage.conclusion: Through these assessment methods, we ensure balanced and sustainable student development, preparing them for success in academic and personal life.

programmes.title: Curriculum
programmes.introDescription: Students are grouped by age and academic development level to provide tailored instruction that meets their needs.

magazine.title: School Magazine
magazine.description: An annual publication prepared by the students and teachers.
magazine.magBy: Prepared by: Writers Club, lead teachers, and administration.
magazine.magContent: Content: Articles, interviews, activities, artistic creations, achievements and memories from the year.
magazine.magProcess: Process: Preparation → Editing → Digital formatting → Director approval → Publishing.

uniformPage.intro: The uniform is an important part of our school identity and culture. It contributes to creating a disciplined, professional, and equal environment for all students, helping them focus on learning and personal development.
uniformPage.colors: Uniform Colors: Our uniform is white and black, and must be clean, neat, and complete in accordance with school regulations.
rules: Students must wear the uniform every school day and during school-organized activities.
The uniform must be clean and neat. Accessories and garments must not conflict with school policy and ethics.
Wearing hats, sunglasses, hoods, gloves, or scarves is not permitted on school premises.
components: Shirt/Blouse: White with a crew neck and short or long sleeves.
Pants/Skirt: Black trousers (full-length or knee-length) or a black skirt (knee-length).
Sweater: White or black, long-sleeved, extending below the waistband of the trousers.
Shoes: White or black, flat, and appropriate for school.
Jackets: Preferably solid-colored, dark or white.
peUniform: Shirt: White, crew neck, short or long sleeves.
Sneakers: White or black, suitable for gym.
uniformPage.closingNote: The uniform is an important part of school life, helping create a disciplined environment focused on academic achievements. We encourage every student to respect the uniform policy and contribute to an organized and equitable school atmosphere.

attendancePage.intro: Regular and consistent attendance is essential for students' academic success and personal development. We believe attending school responsibly helps build good habits and prepare for the future.
rulesParagraphs: Students are expected to attend every school day and arrive on time.
Using the first class period for attendance registration is mandatory.
absencesParagraphs: Every absence must be justified by parents or legal guardians through an official notification.
In cases of medical absences, a medical report is required.
Unexcused absences may impact academic performance and participation in various school activities.
lateParagraphs: Students who arrive late are registered in the secretary's office and placed in a supervised area where they work on class materials and assignments without disrupting the ongoing lesson.
Repeated tardiness will be addressed in collaboration with parents to ensure more regular attendance.
Active presence and participation in the learning process support students' academic and social development, so we consider it one of our top priorities.

disciplinePage.intro: We believe that a disciplined and supportive environment helps students develop responsibility, self-control, and respect for themselves and others. Therefore, we take a clear and balanced approach to discipline and counseling, ensuring every student feels supported and motivated to achieve their academic and personal success.
disciplineParagraphs: Respect, responsibility, and good behavior are core values we promote at school.
Behavior rules are clear and fairly enforced to create a safe and organized environment.
Every disciplinary situation is handled professionally and with an educational approach, helping students understand the impact of their actions.
counselingParagraphs: The school provides support for students' emotional and psychological well-being through counseling.
Teachers and administrators work closely with students to help build confidence, manage stress, and improve social relationships.
We collaborate with parents to ensure every student has the necessary support both inside and outside school.
Discipline and counseling are not meant as punishment, but as education and assistance to foster a positive culture where every student feels motivated and supported to reach their full potential.

councilPage.intro: We value and encourage active parent involvement in school life through the Parent Council. This council serves as a bridge between the school and families, helping to enhance the student experience and develop initiatives that support their education and well-being.
roles: Provides suggestions and ideas for improving school life.
Supports the organization of various activities and events.
Helps strengthen cooperation between parents and academic staff.
Serves as a communication channel for parents' concerns and proposals.
councilPage.closing: All parents are invited to join this active community, contributing ideas and support to build a richer and more successful school environment for their children.

communicationPage.intro: We ensure clear and effective communication between the school, parents, and students through structured channels.

communicationPage.closing: We believe that open and regular communication helps create a supportive environment for our students!

registrationPage.intro:
We believe education begins with a conscious, shared decision between the family and the institution.

We offer a safe, caring environment with high academic standards, where every student is encouraged to develop their full potential—not only in knowledge but also in character, communication, and collaboration.

We want you to choose us for quality.

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.description: The parent or legal guardian contacts the school via the secretary's office or administrators to express interest. During this first meeting, full information is provided about Fenix School's philosophy, curriculum, rules, ethics, and care.

steps.title: Open Enrollment Period
steps.description: Enrollments are possible during specific times of the academic year—usually at year-end, during summer break, or at the end of semesters when student transfers are accommodated.

steps.title: Orientation / Trial Period
steps.description: Depending on demand and availability, an orientation or trial period—typically 3 days to 1 week—is arranged. This period serves as a two-way evaluation: for the family to get acquainted with the environment and program, and for the teaching staff to assess the student's organization, behavior, approach, and academic potential within our school environment.

steps.title: Joint Decision
steps.description: If the orientation period is successful and both parties feel confident about continuing, the official enrollment procedures begin.

steps.title: Contract Signing & Enrollment Fee Payment
steps.description: Once the parent signs the enrollment contract and pays the corresponding fee, the student is officially part of our school community.

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.albaniaDesc: Fenix School collaborates with various institutions and organizations as part of its commitment to humanitarian aid and curricular projects. In Albania, the school partners with the Red Cross, the "Luigj Gurakuqi" school for children with special needs, and the "Jonathan" Down Syndrome Children's Center.
partnerships.abroadDesc: To develop our curriculum and exchange teaching experiences, Fenix has partnered with Wood Farm School in Oxford, England.

aboutPage.welcomeDescr: Since 1996, our school has instilled in children the highest values of both Albanian and Anglo education.
aboutPage.welcomeDescription: Fenix School is a private school located in Tirana, Albania. We are committed to providing a high-quality education that prepares our students for success in the 21st century.
aboutPage.missionDescription: Our mission is to provide a safe and nurturing environment where students can learn, grow, and thrive. We believe in fostering a love of learning and encouraging our students to reach their full potential.
aboutPage.historyDescription: Fenix School was founded in 2010 by a group of dedicated educators who wanted to create a school that would provide a high-quality education for all students. Since then, we have grown into a thriving community of learners.

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.message: Be part of our dedicated education team!
criteria.priority: At our school, quality is our top priority.
criteria.need: We seek teachers who not only teach but also inspire, shape, and lead with dedication every day.
criteria.mission: Education is a mission for us. Therefore, we invite to our team individuals who, in addition to professional training, possess responsibility, ethics, and a deep desire to give their best for every student.
criteria.reqTitle: What We Look for in Our Candidates

At least 3 years of teaching experience

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.teacherOffersTitle: What our school offers to teachers
offer.teacherOffersIntro: At our school, teachers are the heart of our success. We value their work and dedication fairly and honestly — both professionally and personally.
offer.evaluationDesc: We provide a dignified financial reward that reflects their contribution and quality of work. Ongoing professional growth and commitment are truly rewarded.
offer.climateDesc: Our school offers a calm, supportive, and collaborative setting. Communication is always open, with positive energy, respect, and emotional care for every staff member.
wellbeingBenefits: Breakfast, lunch, coffee, and water during the workday

offer.teamSpiritTitle: 🟦 Team spirit and sense of belonging
offer.teamSpiritDesc: We are a united team working toward a common goal: the highest quality in education. Every teacher is respected, heard, and involved.
offer.contactCta: 💬 If you share these values and want to give your best in an environment that supports you, contact us to start your journey with us.

elementary.title: Primary (Grades 1 - 4)
elementary.description: This cycle includes students aged 6 to 9 and focuses on the development of core academic, social, and emotional skills. Instruction is centered on core subjects such as language, mathematics, and science, as well as on the development of creative and expressive skills through art, music, and physical education.

middle.title: Secondary (Grades 5 – 9)
middle.description1: In this cycle (ages 10–14), students deepen their knowledge and competencies in language, mathematics, and science, while also developing creative and expressive skills in art, music, and physical education. This is a crucial stage to prepare students for the national exams and the English curriculum exams that take place at the end of the ninth grade.
middle.description2: During this period, students increase their responsibility for learning and prepare for the academic challenges associated with secondary education and personal development.

history.title: History of Fenix School
history.description: Fenix School was founded in 1996 with a clear vision to create a high-quality educational center that embodies the best of Albanian and English education. For over 30 years, we have been part of thousands of students' lives, supporting their academic and social development.
history.evolutionTitle: How We've Evolved Over the Years:
evolutionPoints: Started with an academic-quality-focused structure and organizational discipline.
Incorporated modern teaching methods to create a more interactive and personalized learning approach.
Integrated the English curriculum with the Albanian one, making us one of the few schools offering this unique model.
Continual improvement of educational quality and student success both in national and international secondary schools.
history.futureDescription: We continue to refine and grow to ensure each new generation receives the best possible education, preparing them for the challenges of our changing world.

activitiesPage.intro: We offer a wide range of activities and events that support the development of our students' social, emotional, and academic skills. Our activities are designed to foster creativity, collaboration, and the full potential of each student.

items.title: Excursions and Educational Visits
items.description: Students participate in excursions and visits that help them learn in an out-of-class setting, experience different cultures, and apply the knowledge they've gained.

items.title: Science Fairs and Projects
items.description: Students develop and present scientific projects, giving them opportunities to experiment and inspire curiosity and scientific inquiry.

items.title: Games and Sports Activities
items.description: Physical and sports activities are an essential part of our program, teaching students the importance of teamwork and fostering physical health.

items.title: End-of-Year Celebration
items.description: A special event that celebrates students' achievements during the school year and honors their efforts.

items.title: Traditional and Cultural Festivals
items.description: The school organizes events that commemorate and honor various traditions and cultures, teaching students to respect and appreciate diversity.

items.title: Open Days and Parent Presentations
items.description: Activities where students showcase their progress and achievements for the year, creating opportunities for parents to be active participants in the learning process.

items.title: 🌍💚 An initiative that enriches our spirit and environment 💚🌍
items.description: For the second consecutive year, plastic bottle caps collected throughout the year by our wonderful students were handed over at our school. This initiative is not just a symbolic act, but a message of hope for those in need – people without limbs or who are paralyzed – and a concrete contribution to a cleaner environment.

items.title: Visit to the museum 'House of Leaves'
items.description:
This Friday, the eighth-grade class visited the 'House of Leaves' museum, where the children got to know up close the house that both gave and took life!
Thank you 'House of Leaves' for your hospitality, and thank you to the parents for their cooperation!

items.title: Our students at the museum of Albanian emotions! ⚽
items.description:
An unforgettable day for class 3M!
The visit to the Albanian Football Historical Museum turned into a unique, emotional, and educational experience. Our students were warmly welcomed by representatives of the Albanian Football Federation and got an up-close look at the journey of Albanian football through historical items, photos, and special relics.

items.title: Science Fair
items.description: This is an activity where students present science projects and experiments prepared by themselves with the continuous support of their teachers and parents. Its aim is to foster curiosity, creativity, and critical thinking in children by encouraging them to explore the world around them in a scientific way.

items.title: Traditional Albanian dance with Jera Çurçija
items.description:
First-grade students had the pleasure of welcoming choreographer and dancer of the National Ensemble Jera Çurçija, a dedicated parent of one of our students.
During this activity, students learned the moves and rhythm of the Tropoja dance, which they thoroughly enjoyed.

activitiesPage.closing: These activities and events are created to ensure a rich and diverse learning environment that helps students grow as whole individuals, developing their academic, social, and emotional skills.

clubsPage.intro: We provide numerous opportunities for students to engage in extracurricular activities, helping them develop their passions and skills across different fields. Our clubs foster collaboration, creativity, and new educational experiences.

items.title: 🎓 Science Club
items.description: A space for exploration and experimentation where students engage in science projects, tech challenges, and innovation contests.

items.title: ⚽ Sports Club
items.description: Offers various sports activities such as soccer, basketball, volleyball, and athletics, encouraging physical health and teamwork.

items.title: 🎵 Music Club
items.description: For music and performance enthusiasts, this club helps students develop their musical skills through singing, instruments, and performances.

items.title: 🎭 Drama Club
items.description: Includes everyone who wants to experiment with acting, theatrical productions, and improvisation, helping build confidence and artistic expression.

items.title: 🎨 Art Club
items.description: A space where students can explore their talent in painting, drawing, sculpture, and other artistic creations.

benefits: ✔ They help students discover and develop their talents

clubsPage.closing: Students are encouraged to join clubs and take advantage of the many opportunities our school offers for personal and academic growth!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content:
We collect the following personal data through our contact forms:
- Name
- Email address
- Message content or inquiry details

This information is voluntarily submitted by you in order to communicate with our team.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
The information you provide is used solely to:
- Respond to your inquiries or requests
- Provide you with relevant information about our school and services

We do not share, sell, or rent your personal data to third parties.

sections.title: Data Storage and Security
sections.content: All personal data submitted through the website is stored securely. We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the right to:
- Request access to your personal data
- Request correction or deletion of your data
- Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at our email.

sections.content: We do not currently use cookies to collect personal information on our website.
